ModMetaData.name: Follow Me
ModMetaData.author: Tanndlin
ModMetaData.description: Ported to 1.5 and a minor bug fix. The mod seemed abandoned, so I decided to port it to 1.5 and take over. All Credits to Fluffy (original mod creator): https://steamcommunity.com/id/FluffyMods/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100 Description Gives the camera tracking capabilities. Features Press the 'Home' key (default, can be changed with in-game keybinding settings) while any colonist, enemy, animal or item is selected, and the camera will follow them (including furniture and plants - but they tend to not move much). Alternatively, you can click with the middle mouse button on colonists in the Colonist Bar on top of the screen to toggle following. Does not require a new save game Can safely be enabled/disabled in ongoing saves. Fixes - Fixed the issue where the camera would not stop following when hitting next/previous pawn hotkey
